entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:24 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Partly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:24 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 5:24 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
